name: Monster War
description:
• Monster War has more than 20 characters. 
  • There are 3 difficulty levels. 
  • Monsters have different features.  
  • They are trying to come your base. 
  • You have to prevent those monsters from entering your area until a certain time. That's why you have to do good strategy. 
  • In each new level there are more powerful and different monsters. 
  •  In addition, after every 5 levels come to us monsters with new features.
